title: 構造体のポインタ 6
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:

<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdlib.h></color>

  <color=#358cd6>int</color> number;
  <color=#358cd6>float</color> point;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>DATA;

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  DATA d = <color=#ffd700>{</color>2,20.0<color=#ffd700>}</color>;
  DATA *p = &d;
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%f"</color>,p->point<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
